hero.body: No more hiring headaches or settling for low-quality support just to save money, Get our elite, multilingual support agents from just $6/hour. handle calls, chats, and emails 24/7
hero.smallText: Start Risk Free , Agent training and integration salary is on us!!!

testimonials.title: Our clients love us
testimonials.caseStudyTitle: How we saved them 7500$ the first 90days

whyUs.title: why us
whyUs.subtitle: The End of Expensive Customer Support
whyUs.intro: For too long, growing businesses have faced an impossible choice:
whyUs.choice2: risk your brand with cheap, low-quality outsourcing.
whyUs.outro: We believe you deserve world-class support without the world-class price tag, Here’s how we make that a reality.

point1.title: Unbeatable Prices
point1.subtitle: No Quality Compromise
point1.body: Your customer support department should be a growth engine, not a cost center. While competitors and freelance platforms charge upwards of 2000$/Month PER AGENT, our model allows us to provide elite , hand-picked talents starting at just 6$/hour , This isn't about cutting corners… it's about giving you a smarter financial advantage to reinvest in your business.
features: Slash operational costs by over 50% compared to other outsourcing solutions
No hidden fees or long-term contracts

point2.title: Elite Talent
point2.subtitle: Hand-Picked for you
point2.body: The biggest fear of outsourcing is a drop in quality. We solve this with our intensive, multi-stage selection process, We only hire communicative, empathetic problem-solvers who can represent your brand professionally , Our standards are so high, we even pay for their training.

audio_proof.title: Don't take our word for it. Hear the difference:

point3.title: Flexible Scaling
point3.subtitle: With Your On-Demand Team.
point3.body:
Traditional outsourcing locks you into rigid, long-term contracts for a fixed number of agents. This forces you to pay for idle time during your quiet periods, leading to wasted budget and inefficiency.
Our model is different. We believe support should breathe with your business. We provide a flexible, scalable team that adapts to your needs in real-time, ensuring you only ever pay for what you actually use.
examples: Just Starting Out? : Hire a single agent to handle initial inquiries.
Facing Seasonal Peaks? : Add more agents for the holiday rush.
Launching a New Product? : Deploy a dedicated team for the launch week to manage the surge.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that suits your needs

flex.name: Flex
flex.description: for solopreneur or small businesses with limited budgets.

talent.name: Talent
talent.description: for small businesses or startups with limited budgets.

business.name: Business
business.description: for large businesses or startups with comfortable budgets.

questions.question: How much does this service cost?
questions.answer: As a benchmark, a full-time (37 - 40 hours/week) contract for one of our elite, accent-free, near-native speaking agents starts at approximately $950 USD per month. The final quote is tailored to your specific needs, such as the number of agents or required languages

questions.question: What languages do your agents speak?
questions.answer: We can provide any combination of monolingual, bilingual, or trilingual teams. Our agents are fluent in:

questions.question: Are there any hidden fees?
questions.answer: No. The monthly rate we quote is all-inclusive for a standard work week. There are no hidden setup fees or management costs. Extra requirements such as overtime are then billed separately at a pre-agreed hourly rate.

questions.question: Who provides and trains on the necessary software (CRM, helpdesk, etc…)
questions.answer: You provide the licenses and train agents on your systems and processes. We pay their full salary during training, so integration costs you nothing.

questions.question: where are we based ?
questions.answer: Our entire team is strategically based in Algeria. This gives us access to a deep pool of highly-educated, multilingual talent . especially for accent-free French and English , allowing us to deliver world-class quality at a fraction of the cost of other outsourcing locations.

about.missionTitle: Our Mission: World-Class Support Shouldn't Cost a Fortune
about.backstory:
My name is Guendil Zine-Eddine, and I started this business in early 2025 out of pure frustration. While working for 3 years in the call center/customer service industry , I saw firsthand how all growing businesses are trapped in the same impossible choice : pay astronomical fees for a quality in-house support team, or settle for outsourcing where the once-affordable rates have disappeared, but the quality issues remain
It felt like a compromise either way. You either sacrificed your budget or you sacrificed your brand's reputation.
I knew there had to be a third option. so I took it upon myself to build a business model on providing uncompromising quality and unbeatable economics, giving growing businesses the powerful support they deserve without the crippling cost…
That is why this company was founded : to offer the genuine quality and fair pricing I saw was missing from the inside

difference.title: Our Difference is Our Approach
difference.intro: We're not a massive, disconnected corporation; we are a curated team of professionals obsessed with quality and results. While traditional outsourcers focus on volume, we focus on value. Our entire model is built on a philosophy of partnership, not just service provision.

points.title: We Invest in Our People:
points.body: We have an intensive vetting process to find the best talent. But we don't stop there. We cover the full cost of training our agents on your brand and your processes, ensuring they sound like a seamless extension of your own team from day one.

points.title: Proof in Partnership:
points.body: We believe trust is earned through tangible results. For one of our first partners, a growing SaaS company, we delivered a significant ROI in just 90 days:
subpoints: With a lean starting team of just 3 agents
A direct saving of $2,500 per agent
All while improving their customer satisfaction scores.

about.readyTitle: Ready to See How We Can Help You?
about.readyBody:
We believe our model is the smartest way for businesses to scale their support. But you don't have to take our word for it. Let us show you the numbers.
Get a clear, no-obligation quote and see exactly how much you can save without ever compromising on quality.

step1.title: Submit your form
step1.description: Fill out our simple form with your requirements

step2.title: We assign suitable agents
step2.description: Our team matches you with the perfect agents

getStarted.title: How to get started
getStarted.subheading: Your Elite Support Team, Live in 3 Simple Steps
getStarted.intro: Outsourcing doesn’t have to be slow, complex, or costly. Our streamlined process gets you a world-class support team in under a week.

step1.title: Step 1 : submit your form
step1.body: fill out the form and we’ll reach out and set up a suitable time for a discovery call so we can learn more about your needs

step2.title: Step 2: Your Custom Blueprint Call
step2.body:
It all starts with a brief, no-obligation 15-minute strategy call
We (you and us) deep dive into your business where we map out your business’s exact needs. , brand tone, and the key metrics for making this a success.
What you get: You'll leave the call with a crystal-clear, customized plan with an all-inclusive quote showing you exactly how much you'll save. No surprises, ever.

step3.title: Step 3: Train Your Elite Team (On Us)
step3.body: While others charge for training, we pay it in full. We hand-pick vetted pros, you walk them through your products and systems, and we cover their salary during the entire training phase. The result: fully prepared agents at a fraction of the market rate, ready to operate like part of your in-house team.

step4.title: Step 4: Go Live & Make Your Customers Satisfied
step4.body: Your trained team is ready to deliver faster responses, smoother resolutions, and consistent service without the overhead. You manage the agents; we handle HR, contracts, and payroll. The result: happier customers, lower costs, and freedom to focus on growth.

getStarted.ready:
Ready to Start Your Blueprint?
The first step is a simple conversation. Let's build your no-obligation plan and show you exactly how easy and affordable world-class support can be.
getStarted.noCommitment: No commitment. No pressure. Just a clear path to savings.
